extension.valueString: Minimum Data Set (MDS) - version 3.0 - Resident Assessment Instrument (RAI) version 1.17.1 [CMS Assessment]

item.text: Functional abilities and goals - discharge [CMS Assessment]
Mobility - discharge performance during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Roll left and right - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Sit to lying - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Lying to sitting on side of bed - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Sit to stand - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Chair/bed-to-chair transfer - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Toilet transfer - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Car transfer - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Not attempted due to medical condition or safety concerns

item.text: Walk 10 feet - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Walk 50 feet with two turns - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Walk 150 feet - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Walking 10 feet on uneven surfaces - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Not attempted due to medical condition or safety concerns

valueCoding.display: Not attempted due to medical condition or safety concerns

item.text: 4 steps - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Not attempted due to medical condition or safety concerns

valueCoding.display: Not attempted due to medical condition or safety concerns
